official_title: The SEQUENCE Trial: Should Endobronchial Ultrasound QUeue bEfore or eNsuing to robotiC-assisted Bronchoscopy for pEripheral Pulmonary Nodule Biopsy? A Patient Randomized Control Trial Assessing the Effect of the Ordering of Robotic-assisted Bronchoscopy and Linear EBUS During the Same Anesthesia Event on Diagnostic Yield From Peripheral Pulmonary Nodule Biopsy
inclusion_criteria:
* Peripheral Pulmonary Nodule undergoing a robotic-assisted bronchoscopy
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * lymph nodes that are enlarged or PET avid on CT prior to procedure
